name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Software Engineer with over 10 years of experience in backend development and a strong focus on delivering high-quality software solutions. Proficient in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Node.js**, **React**, **MongoDB**, **Redis**, **Express**, and adept in cloud services including **Google Cloud Platform**, **Google Kubernetes Engine**, and **Docker**. Demonstrated expertise in Continuous Integration, Automated Testing, and DevOps practices to ensure efficient development cycles. Capable of designing scalable and secure systems while applying best practices in version control, code review, and documentation. Passionate about driving projects forward within collaborative team environments, with a proven history of influencing success at esteemed organizations such as VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.
